titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the libraries of Mr. Sheppard, late of London and of another gentleman deceased : which will be exposed to sale by auction at Mr. Thomas Wards, upholster, at the Boars-Head in Cornhill on Thursday the 16th of this instant December 1686.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
